column1: Smoque BBQ////The first time I went to Smoque
column2: I was terrified. Terrified that they'd run out of beef brisket. You see
column3: I had gone to a different 'Q joint the week before
column4: and they had run out...so justifiably terrified (or just certifiably food crazy). My fears were unfounded as they had beef brisket a plenty.
